Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class BasicGodCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.BasicGodCard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Apollo, Artemis, Athena, Atlas, Chronus, Demeter, Hephaestus, Hestia, Hypnus, Minotaur, Pan, Poseidon, Prometheus, Zeus
    public class BasicGodCard
extends java.lang.Object
    The type Basic god card uses the basic rules of the game so any god can extend this class and override only the method that involves the special power.

        board - the board
